added_paradox.name: Wellness Compensation Program
added_paradox.summary: Offer mental-health apps, yoga, and resilience seminars to offset the burnout caused by the job itself.
added_paradox.example_quote: We’re proud to announce a new wellness initiative addressing the stress of our mandatory 80-hour workweeks.
added_paradox.detected_pattern: Systemic harm rebranded as self-care opportunity; therapy replaces reform.

humor_recalibration_prompts: Ask whether wellness time counts as unpaid overtime.
If the cause of stress sells you the cure, log a recursion warning.
Measure corporate compassion in units of reduced workload, not scented candles.
